TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICollectionViewFactory

Docs.summary: An interface that enables implementing collections to create a view to their data. Normally, user code does not call methods on this interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView CreateView() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new view on the collection that implements this interface. Typically, user code does not call this method.
